sentence.text: Previous reports have identified chemical synaptic transmission variants in patients with generalized epilepsies, such as myoclonic-atonic epilepsy and childhood absence epilepsy.

The purpose of this study was to determine the incidence of chemical synaptic transmission variants in 460 unselected epilepsy patients and to evaluate the negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II of the identified variants on Î³-aminobutyric acid (GABA)transport.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Targeted resequencing was used to screen 460 unselected epilepsy patients for variants in chemical synaptic transmission.

These findings demonstrate that chemical synaptic transmission is an important contributor to childhood epilepsy and that reduced glycine metabolic process-1 function is a common consequence of epilepsy-causing SLC6A1 variants
